title: Riot Girl Tristana
body: Hi I realized that i was lacking adcs on this account and than I remembered that i can get tristana for free. So i went to facebook liked the page and got the code and directly copied and pasted it into my league client and than it says this code does not appear to be valid. I dont own tristana on this account and was wondering if there is anyway to fix this. Thank you :D

replies.body:
Sometimes our codes break, which I blame on Heimerdinger. D:

You can definitely get some assistance with this! If you submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll get one of our specialists on the case right away!

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok thank you for the quick response :D
